tool_description: Schedules volunteer opportunity listings for optimal publishing times and manages content updates across multiple platforms.

listing_id.description: ID of the volunteer listing to schedule

target_platforms.description: Platforms where the listing should be scheduled

custom_publish_time.description: Custom publishing time if using custom strategy

stagger_interval.description: Interval in minutes between platform publications for staggered strategy

auto_repost.description: Whether to automatically repost listings periodically

repost_frequency.description: Days between automatic reposts if enabled

error_messages: Invalid listing ID: The provided listing_id does not exist or is not ready for scheduling.
Invalid scheduling strategy: Use 'immediate', 'optimal', 'custom', or 'staggered' for scheduling_strategy.
Invalid custom publish time: custom_publish_time must be a valid future date-time when using custom strategy.
Invalid stagger interval: stagger_interval must be between 5 and 480 minutes.
Invalid repost frequency: repost_frequency must be between 1 and 90 days.
Invalid timezone: Provide a valid timezone identifier.
Scheduling conflict: The requested schedule conflicts with platform posting limits or restrictions.
Platform scheduling unavailable: One or more platforms do not support scheduled publishing.
usage: Provide listing_id and target_platforms, then choose a scheduling_strategy. Configure additional parameters based on the selected strategy and requirements.

schedule_created.description: Whether the schedule was successfully created

scheduled_publications.description: Details of scheduled publications for each platform
